text: Jean-François Stévenin (; 23 April 1944 - 27 July 2021) was a French actor and filmmaker. He was born in Lons-le-Saunier, France. His career began in 1968. He was known for her roles in The Dogs of War, Cold Moon and Sushi Sushi.
